/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their red and white facades standing out against the blue sky. The buildings are adorned with balconies and awnings, adding character to the cityscape. Trees and street lamps punctuate the scene, providing shade and light. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is a blend of urban architecture and natural elements, showcasing the vibrant city life in Beijing.
